abstract: The bank says it is not ceding any ground to investors who want it to buy back tens of billions of dollars in mortgages.
snippet: The bank says it is not ceding any ground to investors who want it to buy back tens of billions of dollars in mortgages.
lead_paragraph: In a bid to turn down the temperature in what promises to be an extended legal battle, Bank of America has opened a dialogue with investors who want the bank to buy back tens of billions in soured mortgages.

headline.main: Bank of America Starts Talks on Soured Mortgages
